name: CXCallAction
desc: A programmatic interface for objects that represent a telephony action associated with a call object.

items.name: init(call: UUID)
items.desc: Initializes a new action for a call identified by a given UUID.

items.name: init?(coder: NSCoder)
items.desc: Creates a new action for a call with data in an unarchiver.

items.name: var callUUID: UUID
items.desc: The unique identifier for the call associated with the action.
